commands.name: az network dns record-set soa show
commands.syntax:
az network dns record-set soa show [--ids]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--subscription]
                                   [--zone-name]
examples: az network dns record-set soa show -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network dns record-set soa update
commands.summary: Update properties of an SOA record.
commands.syntax:
az network dns record-set soa update --resource-group
                                     --zone-name
                                     [--email]
                                     [--expire-time]
                                     [--host]
                                     [--if-none-match]
                                     [--minimum-ttl]
                                     [--refresh-time]
                                     [--retry-time]
                                     [--serial-number]
examples:
az network dns record-set soa update -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -e myhostmaster.mysite.com
az network dns record-set soa update --email myhostmaster.mysite.com --only-show-errors --resource-group MyResourceGroup --subscription MySubscription --zone-name www.mysite.com
